## IsTypingParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IsTypingParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [typing](./test-keyboard.istypingparams.typing.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indicates whether the text input is part of a typing sequence (i.e. into an editor) This can change a few semantics.<!-- -->e.g. Pressing enter by default fires: <code>keydown</code> , <code>keyup</code> however when pressed in a text editor it fires: <code>keydown</code> , <code>keypress</code>, <code>keyup</code> |
